title: GET_POS_ALONG_GPS_TYPE_ROUTE
content:
0xF3162836C28F9DA50x40BB1149// GetPosAlongGpsTypeRoute
BOOL GET_POS_ALONG_GPS_TYPE_ROUTE(Vector3* result, BOOL bStartAtPlayerPos, float fDistanceAlongRoute, int slotType);Parameters:result: Coordinates of waypoint markerbStartAtPlayerPos: Should we project distance from the player position or from next node.fDistanceAlongRoute: Distance we want to get the position along the route.slotType: Type of gps route to check against. See eGpsSlotType.Returns: will return true if a position is returned, false if not.Native to get a position along current player GPS route using supplied slot.
This native was previously named GET_GPS_WAYPOINT_ROUTE_END, but its named changed.enum eGpsSlotType {
	GPS_SLOT_WAYPOINT = 0,
	GPS_SLOT_RADAR_BLIP = 1,
	GPS_SLOT_DISCRETE = 2
}
Old name:  GET_GPS_WAYPOINT_ROUTE_END
codeBlocks:
// GetPosAlongGpsTypeRoute
BOOL GET_POS_ALONG_GPS_TYPE_ROUTE(Vector3* result, BOOL bStartAtPlayerPos, float fDistanceAlongRoute, int slotType);

-- Example usage for GET_POS_ALONG_GPS_TYPE_ROUTE
GetPosAlongGpsTypeRoute(0, true, 1.0, 1)
